summary: The diff implements most of the 8 requirements but has several gaps. REQ-1 through REQ-8 are largely addressed, but key sub-requirements are missing or incomplete: GlobalHeader still uses lucide-react Bell and User icons; Subscription.tsx and SubscriptionScreen.tsx advantage lists use green CheckIcon instead of SVG thin-dash bullets; the 'Voir mon profil public' button and pro-profile-at-position-1 logic are absent; Explorer card border uses 0.05 opacity instead of specified 0.06. Two hallucinated features appear in BookingFlow.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: GlobalHeader bell and user icons must be replaced with inline SVG icons (stroke 1.5px, currentColor); lucide-react icons must not be used.
missing_requirements.reason: GlobalHeader.tsx still imports Bell and User from lucide-react and renders them directly, violating the SVG-only icon rule.

missing_requirements.requirement: Subscription modal advantage list must use SVG thin-dash bullets (no emoji, no green check icons).
missing_requirements.reason: Both Subscription.tsx and SubscriptionScreen.tsx still render a green CheckIcon (SVG checkmark) next to each benefit item instead of the required SVG thin-dash bullet.

missing_requirements.requirement: 'Voir mon profil public' button must navigate to Explorer with the pro profile visible at position 1.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of a 'Voir mon profil public' button or logic to inject the pro profile at position 1 in Explorer is present in any modified file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Explorer cards border must be 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.06).
missing_requirements.reason: Explorer.tsx uses rgba(255,255,255,0.05) on cards instead of the required rgba(255,255,255,0.06).

hallucinated_features.description: BookingFlow.tsx includes a SuccessAnimation component with confetti particles and a progress bar not requested for the booking flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: The spec's confetti and progress bar success overlay are specified only for the ProSubscriptionModal activation flow (REQ-3). A separate SuccessAnimation in BookingFlow was not requested in any of C1-C8.

hallucinated_features.description: BookingFlow.tsx includes a QRCode component that renders a visual QR code pattern.
hallucinated_features.reason: No QR code feature was requested anywhere in REQ-1 through REQ-8 or the build constraints.
